title: User Authentication and Security Module
summary: Implement secure login with multi-factor authentication and data protection measures.
description: Develop a robust authentication system allowing users to log in securely using multi-factor authentication methods such as OTPs or authentication apps. This module should also enforce strong password policies, protect sensitive user data through encryption, and include user session management mechanisms. The solution must align with regulatory compliance standards for financial services, preventing unauthorized access to customer information.

title: Personalized Dashboard and User Profile
summary: Build a customizable dashboard displaying services and products tailored to user profiles.
description: Design and implement a personalized dashboard that dynamically displays relevant banking products and services based on the customer's profile, preferences, and eligibility criteria. This EPIC includes integrating user profile management, allowing customers to update personal information, and enabling real-time insights into balances, recent transactions, and promotional offers. The dashboard should prioritize clarity, simplicity, and intuitive navigation to enhance user satisfaction.

title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
summary: Enable streamlined digital workflows for account opening and service modifications.
description: Implement user-friendly workflows that allow customers to open new accounts, request modifications, or access additional banking services with minimal friction. Define modular process flows that guide users step-by-step, prepopulate data where possible, and minimize redundant inputs. Ensure back-end validation and real-time status visibility throughout the transaction lifecycle.

title: Real-Time Notifications and Status Updates
summary: Integrate real-time tracking and messaging for submitted requests.
description: Create a notification system that provides users with real-time updates on the progress of their account and service requests. Enable push, SMS, and email notifications for different events, including successful submissions, approvals, or rejections. All notifications should be configurable within user preferences and maintain a consistent tone to align with the bank’s communication standards.

title: Document Uploads and Saved Applications
summary: Allow users to upload documents and resume incomplete applications seamlessly.
description: Develop a secure document upload feature enabling users to attach necessary identification or financial documents directly through the portal. Implement an autosave mechanism for partially completed applications, allowing customers to resume the process later without losing data integrity. Files must be stored securely and comply with data privacy regulations.

title: Integration with Core Banking Systems
summary: Establish seamless integration with the bank’s existing core banking infrastructure.
description: Integrate the self-service portal with the existing core banking systems for real-time synchronization of user data, transactions, and service requests. Develop APIs or middleware components to ensure reliable communication between systems while maintaining data consistency and operational efficiency. Include fallback mechanisms for handling connectivity issues gracefully.

title: Role-Based Access Control and Authorization
summary: Implement user access and role management to control feature visibility.
description: Introduce a role-based access control system ensuring users only view and access functions appropriate to their roles and authorization levels. This includes managing administrator privileges, customer-level access, and restricted operations. The access control system must align with organizational compliance and governance policies.

title: Activity History and Audit Trail
summary: Maintain a detailed history of user interactions within the self-service portal.
description: Establish comprehensive logging and audit capabilities capturing all user interactions, transactions, and modifications within the portal. The history should be accessible to users, displaying past service requests and outcomes, while enabling internal staff to perform audits for compliance verification and fraud detection. Ensure logs are immutable and securely stored.

title: Responsive Design and Multi-Device Optimization
summary: Enhance the user experience through responsive design across all devices.
description: Design and implement a responsive user interface providing a consistent and user-friendly experience across desktops, tablets, and mobile devices. The layout must adapt seamlessly to different screen sizes and orientations while maintaining performance efficiency. Conduct usability testing to ensure accessibility, speed, and visual consistency.
